title: UI font size changed in 8.20, Unable to revert?
body:
The font size for pretty much everything on the UI is incredibly small in 8.20, everything from AD/AP values to cooldown times and the first one i noticed the gold count under the items. These are now much harder to read for no real reason, from 100 HUD size to 1 HUD size the small font still scales to be small compared to the other UI elements like the frames.

Is this intentional? Will there be an option to revert to the old font size thats easier to read? Im failing to see the reason why you would intentionally make your fonts smaller and increase the strain on player eyes while the rest of the HUD remains the exact same size.

replies.body:
Hi Cheap Trick,

Thanks for reporting this. I've checked it out and personally agree that the font size is uncomfortably small now. I'm asking around to see if this was an intended change and passing on the feedback to the dev teams.
